p: Group I (CTR): animals served as control and received equivalent volume of corn oil (1 ml), group II (M): animals were treated with malathion at 200 mg/kg body weight/day dissolved in 1 ml of corn oil, group III (LSEO): animals received Lavandula stoechas essential oils (50 mg/kg b.w.) and group IV (M + LSEO): animals received both malathion and LSEO under the same conditions.
